definition: sacrum (anatomy)/bone forming the base of the spinal column
sacrum (anatomy)/bone forming the base of the spinal column

sentences.english: Healing the sacroiliac joint takes constant vigilance.
sentences.chinese: 骶髂关节的治疗需要时刻保持警惕。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the role of ultrasound in the diagnosis of spinal meningocele in sacrococcygeal region of fetus.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨超声对胎儿骶尾部脊膜膨出的诊断价值。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the morphologic characters of the sacral foramina for providing anatomic foundation for operation on the sacrum.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察骶孔形态特征，为骶骨手术提供解剖学依据。

sentences.english: Direction of manual force applied during assessment of stiffness in the lumbosacral spine.
sentences.chinese: 力方向的过程中应用刚度评估手册在腰骶脊柱。

sentences.english: Pilonidal sinus is a common chronic disease of the sacrococcygeal region.
sentences.chinese: 藏毛窦是一种骶尾部区常见的的慢性疾病。

sentences.english: Objective To study anorectal functional status in patients with lumbosacral spinal cord injury (SCI).
sentences.chinese: 目的研究腰骶脊髓损伤患者肛管直肠功能状况。

sentences.english: Pyogenic sacroiliitis is a rarely occurring disease.
sentences.chinese: 化脓性骶髂关节炎是一种很少发生的疾病。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the diagnosis and treatment of sacral arachnoid cysts.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨骶管内蛛网膜囊肿的诊断和治疗。

sentences.english: An extensive sacrococcygeal chordoma is considered a challenge for neurosurgeons.
sentences.chinese: 广泛性骶尾椎脊索瘤被认为是神经外科的挑战。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze treatment and prognosis of sacrococcygeal endodermal sinus tumor.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨骶尾部内胚窦瘤的治疗和预后。

sentences.english: This kind of separation is, by definition, sacroiliac dysfunction.
sentences.chinese: 理论上说，这种分离理论上就是骶髂关节功能紊乱。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss and explore the clinical effect of radiotherapy for chordoma in sacrum caudal region.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨放疗在骶尾部脊索瘤临床治疗中的作用。

sentences.english: The sacrotuberous and sacrospinous ligaments provide additional support posteriorly.
sentences.chinese: 骶结节韧带和骶棘韧带提供额外的后方支撑。

sentences.english: The sacrotuberous and sacrospinous ligaments provide additional support posteriorly.
sentences.chinese: 骶结节韧带和骶棘韧带提供额外的后方支撑。

sentences.english: This can be a lightening rod for sacroiliac pain.
sentences.chinese: 它是骶髂疼痛的避雷针。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo explore the efficacy and safety of sacral neuromodulation(SNM) for the treatment to neurogenic bladder.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨骶神经电刺激治疗神经源性膀胱的临床效果。

definition: ilium/outermost bone of the pelvic girdle/Taiwan pr. [ka4]
sacrum (anatomy)/bone forming the base of the spinal column
ilium (the large flat bone of the pelvic girdle)
thoracic vertebra/the twelve thoracic vertebras behind the ribcage of humans and most mammals
kneecapping/to cut or smash the kneecaps as corporal punishment
